channel.title: python on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in python on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-05
item.description: Alphabet is launching a company that uses AI for drug discovery (3 minute read) Isomorphic Laboratories is a new company from Alphabet that will use artificial intelligence for drug discovery.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-02
item.description: Apple releases Chrome extension for iCloud passwords (1 minute read) Apple has released iCloud Passwords, an official iCloud Keychain Chrome extension for Windows and Mac.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-29
item.description: Apple search engine efforts ‘stepping up’ as Google deal under threat (4 minute read) Apple has been working on its Applebot crawler since before 2015, and with Google under investigation for antitrust practices, it may have to put it to use.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-07
item.description: Apple’s ‘Hi, Speed’ iPhone 12 invite sparks speculation: Midnight Blue, 5G, AirTags, more (2 minute read) Apple has sent out invitations for its ‘Hi, Speed’ event on October 13th at 10 AM PT.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-15
item.description: Amazon’s new smart shopping cart lets you check out without a cashier (4 minute read) Amazon has a new smart grocery store cart that is equipped with a touchscreen and other hardware to automatically detect what items are being placed inside it.
